name: R2_v3_RoleCode_for_R5
title: Cross-version VS for R2.v3 Code System RoleCode for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version ValueSet represents concepts from http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/v3-RoleCode|2015-07-31 for use in FHIR R5. Concepts not present here have direct `equivalent` mappings crossing all versions from R2 to R5.

concept.display: non-country member minor without residence permit

Ambulatory Health Care Facilities; Clinic/Center; Rehabilitation: Cardiac Facilities
